alert.note: Alert for Hinds; Madison; Rankin; Yazoo (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 29 at 2:27PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Rankin, central Yazoo, central Hinds and western Madison Counties through 330 PM CDT... At 227 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Phoenix to 7 miles west of Raymond. Movement was northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Phoenix around 235 PM CDT. Jackson around 240 PM CDT. Clinton and Little Yazoo around 245 PM CDT. Myrleville around 250 PM CDT. Pocahontas around 255 PM CDT. Madison, Ridgeland and Annandale around 300 PM CDT. Gluckstadt and Vaughan around 305 PM CDT. Canton around 310 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Learned, Satartia and Bentonia. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service office in Jackson.
